experiences: Designed a process to hold trade cancellations, ensuring sync with clearing house reports, eliminating 100+ discrepancies annually, and enhancing compliance.
Built a self-monitoring script to auto-cancel trades exceeding 30 days, reducing manual workload by 75% and ensuring compliance with detailed audit logs.

Engineered a secure data backup pipeline, transferring 500GB of critical data monthly to AWS S3, cutting disaster recovery time by 60%, and ensuring 14-year secure storage for audits and investigations.
Configured IBM MQ connections between SMAC and 5+ partner systems, improving message transmission reliability to 99.8% uptime, minimizing data loss, and ensuring seamless trade processing.
Optimized the codebase to integrate Pound Sterling and Euro into corporate actions, enabling 1,000+ additional transactions monthly and expanding currency handling.
Implemented a secure process to retrieve passwords from CyberArk CCP, eliminating storage of 500+ passwords and mitigating security risks.
Refactored critical business logic, resolving 10+ production bugs and accelerating response time from 4s to 2.5s,reducing downtime by 15 hours/month.

As the Students of Color Outreach Coordinator, I focus on fostering an inclusive community by directly engaging with and supporting students of color. My responsibilities include gathering and analyzing demographic data to better understand our student population, keeping campus communities informed by updating TV monitors with relevant content, and conducting outreach through emails and social media to ensure students of color feel connected, supported, and heard. Through these efforts, I strive to create an environment that embraces diversity and supports the unique experiences of every student.
